actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to permit veterans enrolled as full time students in the Spring quarter or semester to continue their work study program during the summer break.

summary.text: Increases the maximum annual work-study allowance from $625 to $1,875 for veteran-student services.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to permit veterans enrolled as full time students in the Spring quarter or semester to continue their work study program during the summer break.
